DOC.brief_summary: An actual use trial demonstrate consumer exceed label daily dose Aleve 24 Hour unacceptable rate . Two aspect consumer use evaluate : 1 ) frequency consumer exceed label-defined daily dose , thus put clinical risk , 2 ) reason exceed label daily dose .
DOC.criteria: At least 12 year age Report take OTC analgesic pain least 5 day last month Report pain least last 3 month last longer 12 hour believe would last longer 12 hour treat Able read understand English Provide write informed consent ( subject 1217 year age provide write assent and/or parent legal guardian provide write consent ) Provide contact information Purchase investigational product Have participate trial involve OTC analgesic last 6 month They someone else household work market research company , advertising agency , public relation firm , pharmaceutical company , healthcare professional , part health care practice ( eliminate reason confidentiality increase awareness drug label ) Have history know allergy NSAIDs ( i.e. , naproxen , ibuprofen , aspirin , etc . ) Have history heart surgery last 60 day plan heart surgery next 60 day ( Female subject ) pregnant breastfeed
